page.title: 18Shops and Stalls - three
page.content: On the{Bond Industrial Estate}there is also a firm distributing sandwiches to public houses. These firms mainly supply local people and about 20 local people are employed on the site. {PRESTO SUPERMARKET-}This store, part of the Argyll Group, opened in May 1984 as part of a large residential development in Evesham.It has a large car park and serves customers from all the surrounding villages.It has the usual departments including fruit & vegetables, Dairy, Provisions, Butchery, Bakery, Frozen goods and cigarettes and information desk.Bread and cakes are baked in the store.Cold meats and meat for roasting are prepared on site. It provides employment for 42 full time staff and 75 part time.
